about_the_game:
Step into the chilling world of Whispers of the Dead, a psychological horror game that blurs the lines between love, fear, and reality. The story begins with Eve Levine, a college student caught in a nightmare after being abducted on a rainy evening in the shadowy St. Peters Park. Her fiancé, Adam Hale, a poet haunted by his own creations, must confront the darkness that emerges from his mysterious writings.

As Adam, you’ll navigate his dimly lit apartment, gathering scattered poems that weave cryptic tales of the seven deadly sins. Each verse pulls you deeper into a web of eerie phenomena, unexplained sounds, and unsettling encounters. But the true terror lies in what these poems foretell—a connection to Eve’s fate and the horrors yet to come.

The nightmare intensifies as the story shifts to Eve, who awakens in a desolate forest, surrounded by whispers and shadows. A crackling radio voice informs her she’s the prey in a deadly hunt. Armed with a single weapon, she must evade and defeat three merciless foes:

  • Leviathan: A silent predator who only moves when unseen, her presence a constant threat.

  • Belthazar: A patient killer who strikes when you linger in a firelight.

  • Mammon: A relentless pursuer who knows no boundaries.

Survival demands cunning and courage as Eve fights her way through the darkness, uncovering fragments of a sinister plot.

Back in Adam’s apartment, the final act begins as he awakens to an alarm blaring through the quiet. When he investigates, he’s met by a celestial figure cloaked in shadow, standing before a portal of fire.

As the series progresses, the hunters are revealed as grotesque manifestations of sin, the radio voice shifts between sinister and sympathetic, and the truth of Adam and Eve’s connection to this nightmarish world comes to light.

Key Features:

  • A dark, immersive story inspired by the seven deadly sins.

  • First-person survival horror gameplay with uniquely designed enemies.

  • An atmosphere filled with tension, mystery, and unexpected scares.

  • Twisting narrative layers that challenge your perception of reality.

The hunt has begun. Will you survive the Whispers of the Dead?

Compelling Narrative:

  • A chilling story that intertwines themes of love, fear, and the seven deadly sins.

  • Dual perspectives: Experience the horrors through the eyes of both Adam and Eve.

  • A mind-bending plot that gradually unveils a deeper, twisted reality.

  • Atmospheric Gameplay:

    • Immersive, haunting environments from eerie apartments to dark, foreboding forests.

    • Dynamic soundscapes and visuals designed to heighten tension and dread.

    • Purposeful design that blurs the boundaries between game and reality.

  • Unique Enemies:

    • A relentless entity who strikes when unseen.

    • A deadly foe who punishes hesitation in firelight.

    • A constant hunter who never loses the trail.

  • First-Person Survival Horror:

    • Tactical survival mechanics where every choice and movement matters.

    • Tense moments of stealth, combat, and resource management.

  • Puzzle Elements:

    • Solve mysteries tied to Adam's poems and the seven deadly sins.

    • Unravel clues hidden in both narrative and gameplay.

  • Thrilling Cinematic Moments:

    • Jump scares and supernatural events that keep you on edge.

    • Dramatic confrontations with ominous figures, including a celestial antagonist.

  • Replay Value:

    • Multiple layers of storytelling that reward exploration and attention to detail.

    • Teasing mysteries that connect to future chapters in the series.

content_descriptors.notes:
Poetry and texts within the game contain references and inference of acts, such as cannibalism, sexual assault, and violence.

Kidnapping and gun violence are depicted within the game as well.

  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3800X, Intel Core i7-10700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 (12 GB)
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
